title: Radical Index
text: What is the index of the radical?
speech: What is the index of the radical?
pacedSpeech: What is the index of the radical?

title: Even radical index
text: Since the radical index is $$2$$, it is even, so, the radicand must be greater than or equal to $$0$$.
speech: Since the radical index is  2 , it is even, so, the radicand must be greater than or equal to  0, .

title: Solving the Radicand
speech: Solve  2 minus 3 x is greater than or equal to 0
pacedSpeech: Solve   2 minus 3 x is greater than or equal to 0

title: Solve the Inequality
text: Subtract $$2$$ from both sides of the inequality which gives $$-3x$$ is greater than and equal to $$-2$$.
speech: Subtract  2  from both sides of the inequality which gives  negative 3 x,  is greater than and equal to  negative 2 .
pacedSpeech: from both sides of the inequality which gives   negative 3 x,
is greater than and equal to   negative 2

title: Solve the Inequality
text: Divide both sides of the inequality by $$-3$$ which gives $$x$$ is less than and equal to $$\frac{2}{3}$$. We can turn it into interval notation as $$(-\infty,\frac{2}{3}]$$.
speech: Divide both sides of the inequality by  minus 3  which gives  x  is less than and equal to  2 thirds . We can turn it into interval notation as , the open closed interval from negative infinity to 2 thirds .
